derivation: a primitive root (rather denominative from H6281 (עֶתֶר));
outline:
1. to pray, entreat, supplicate
    1. (Qal) to pray, entreat
    2. (Niphal) to be supplicated, be entreated
    3. (Hiphil) to make supplication, plead
strongs_def: to burn incense in worship, i.e. intercede (reciprocally, listen to prayer)
